sentences.english: Deputy Mayor of Yingkou municipal government.
sentences.chinese: 營口市人民政府副市長。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the autonomous region government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦自治區人民政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: The people's government must conduct all its activities along the revolutionary mass line.
sentences.chinese: 人民政府必須按照革命羣衆路線進行一切活動。

sentences.english: The people's government controlled the nation's economy and set up a state-owned socialist economy.
sentences.chinese: 人民政府控制經濟命脈並建立了公有制社會主義經濟。

sentences.english: The people's government stands on a street in the west of Chengguan town.
sentences.chinese: 人民政府就在城關鎮靠西的那個街上。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the autonomous government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦自治區人民政府交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments designated by the regional government and state commerce bureau.
sentences.chinese: 承擔自治區人民政府和國家商務部交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: The findings shall be reported to the said people's governments without delay.
sentences.chinese: 災情調查結果，應當及時報告本級人民政府。

sentences.english: Local people's governments at various levels shall place under their protection cultural relics in their respective administrative areas.
sentences.chinese: 地方各級人民政府保護本行政區域內的文物。

sentences.english: Wan Haichuan was appointed Member of Party Leadership Group of the People's Government of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 任命彎海川爲新疆維吾爾自治區人民政府黨組成員。

sentences.english: These Procedures apply to the Shanghai Chemical Industry Area (hereinafter referred to as the SCIA ) established under the approval of the Municipal People's Government.
sentences.chinese: 本辦法適用於市人民政府批准設立的上海化學工業區。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it is one of the priority projects of Xiangcheng District People's Government.
sentences.chinese: 同時也是薌城區人民政府重點工程之一。

sentences.english: In case of a shortage of reserves, the people's government of the pooling region shall advance the payment.
sentences.chinese: 儲備金不足支付的，由統籌地區的人民政府墊付。

sentences.english: People's Government of Ewenke, administrative division of the county level, in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古自治區鄂溫克族自治旗人民政府。

sentences.english: Translated Description: edition by the City People's up, "Mayor Hotline" office set up.
sentences.chinese: 本版由達州市人民政府“市長熱線”辦公室開辦。

sentences.english: The posting is in areas prohibited for advertising by people's governments at and above the county level.
sentences.chinese: 當地縣級以上地方人民政府禁止設置戶外廣告的區域。
